mapper.insert: insert into chat (user_code, chat_body, insert_date, update_date) values (#{userCode}, #{chatBody}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_code as userCode, name from user where id = #{id}
select insert_date as insertDate, update_date as updateDate from chat where chat_id = #{chatId}
mapper.update: update chat set chat_body = #{chatBody}, update_date = now() where chat_id = #{chatId}
